pr_title: AsyncResponseImpl.initContinuation() throws NPE when Continuation is null

timeline.body:
The message text seems a little harsh.  Maybe something like:
```suggestion
            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Continuation not supported. Please ensure that all servlets and servlet filters must support async operations");
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
The message text seems a little harsh. Maybe something like:

Suggested change
throw new IllegalArgumentException("All servlets and servlet filters must support async!");
throw new IllegalArgumentException("Continuation not supported. Please ensure that all servlets and servlet filters must support async operations");
timeline.author: andymc12

timeline.bodyHTML:
same as above. Also, not a huge deal, but you can save a line of code by doing:

if (provider == null) {
    throw new IllegalArgumentException("Continuation not supported. Please ensure that all servlets and servlet filters must support async operations");
}
cont = provider.getContinuation();
timeline.author: andymc12

timeline.message: jaxrs - throw an IllegalArgumentException in AsyncResponseImpl.initContinuation() instead of an NPE when user includes a servlet or servlet filter that does not support async
